prompt: What type of warranty does Toronto Metropolitan University offer for the Prize awarded in connection with the Contest?
completion: None of the Released Parties makes any representation or offers any warranty, express or implied, as to the quality or fitness of the Prize awarded in connection with the Contest.

prompt: Can a confirmed winner seek reimbursement or pursue any legal or equitable remedy from the Sponsor or any of the Released Parties if the Prize fails to be fit for its purpose or is in any way unsatisfactory?
completion: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, each confirmed winner understands and acknowledges that he or she may not seek reimbursement or pursue any legal or equitable remedy from neither the Sponsor nor any of the Released Parties should the Prize fail to be fit for its purpose or is in any way unsatisfactory.

prompt: What happens if the Prize or a component thereof does not prove satisfactory, either in whole or in part?
completion: By accepting the Prize, each confirmed winner agrees to waive all recourse against the Released Parties if the Prize or a component thereof does not prove satisfactory, either in whole or in part.
